===Attraction and attachment===
 
===Attraction and attachment===
 
The conventional view in [[biology]] is that there are two major drives in love — [[sexual attraction]] and [[attachment theory|attachment]]. Attachment between adults is presumed to work on the same principles that lead an infant to become attached to his or her mother.
